title: Adventure Academy: Weather or Naught
description: In a lesson on how to control a Weather Gnome, Witchy Simone casts a spell that causes a blizzard and Prohyas must tame the weather with Magiswords.

title: Ain't That a Kick in the Side?
description: After Witch Way teases Prohyas by calling him, "Vambre's sidekick," Prohyas intensifies his efforts to prove them wrong.

title: Adventure Academy: Dino Ducking
description: Prohyas and Morbidia are chosen to dodge a gauntlet of charging mechanical dinosaurs in today's lesson from Professor C, but Prohyas panics and defeats the mechanized beasts with Magiswords instead.

title: Winning at Whining
description: Vambre's challenge to Prohyas: Don't whine for the entirety of the next mission and you can have the Magisword we get at the end.

title: Adventure Academy: Sheepy Jungle Shearing
description: Prohyas and Bimm need more than just electric clippers to sheer the constantly growing Sheepy Jungle fluff, they need Magiswords!

title: Fixing a Flonk
description: Wanting to stop Flonk from being an evildoer for good, Prohyas tries to find Flonk a permanent venue for his nasty comedy. Vambre, however, wants to deliver him to the cops as usual.

title: Keeper of the Mask
description: Vambre and Prohyas encounter the Keeper of the "Mask Magi-Sword" who challenges them to a contest.

title: To Boulderly Go
description: Vambre & Prohyas' quest for the boulder treasure leads them to Grup the Dragon.

title: Adventure Academy: Snow Decoys
description: Ghastly terrors of Transylbiria can be evaded by making snow decoys, but when Morbidia uses magic, her Abominable Snow Decoy must be destroyed by Vambre's Magiswords.

title: Suitable Armor
description: A veteran warrior insists that Vambre is under dressed for battle and takes it upon herself to garb Vambre in armor as Prohyas fights the beast solo without armor.

title: Changeable Terraingable
description: Personality conflicts between Vambre and Prohyas come to a head as the Warriors miraculously manage to ace a mission at an ever changing labyrinth.

title: Vambre's Guilty Pleasure
description: Vambre tries her best to keep her tough Warrior reputation intact and still go to the cutesy wootsy Piggiepie Jones stage show.

title: Adventure Academy: Dragonators
description: With Gateaux wearing a dragon costume, and Vambre as a dragon-slaying knight, an exercise in dragon slaying takes a dramatic turn when Gateaux's magic turns him into a real dragon!

title: Dolphinominal
description: Phil the thief swipes Prohyas' beloved Dolphin Magisword.

title: Adventure Academy: Fickle Fishing
description: Fishing for the fickle fish of the Fickle Sea is tricky. Vambre and Bimm need special bait to lure them, but when a monster fish attacks Bimm, Vambre comes to the rescue with Magiswords.

title: Bookish
description: Prohyas acts as matchmaker to a bookstore clerk who has a crush on Vambre.

title: Adventure Academy: Royal Tower Rescue
description: The day's lesson details the four quick steps necessary to rescue royalty from a tower, but when the rabid King Squirrel mauls poor Cattus, its up to Vambre to rescue both with her Magiswords.

title: Adventure Academy: Whack-A-Shark
description: Vambre and Phibby Croax are chosen to Whack A Shark in shark tanks, but Vambre decides that Magiswords will do better to defeat them than bops on the shark's schnozzola!

title: Attacktus
description: The Warriors are sent to the Barren Faceland to water a cactus, which grows into a giant cactus beast that attacks them.

title: Adventure Academy: Sluggernaut
description: Professor Cyrus wears a giant slug costume as Vambre and Neddy battle him on the round woody stage, but Vambre avoids a gooey brawl using Magiswords to make her the slug slayer.

title: Whose Hyas Is It Anyway?
description: The Warriors travel to futuristic Galacton and must figure out a way to get the Confusing Alien Magisword from Nohyas.

title: Phil's in the House
description: To exact his revenge on the Warriors, Phil the philanderer hides in The Warriors' house and turns the siblings against each other.

title: Do You Know the Muffin King?
description: The Warriors are treated to a banquet by the grateful Kotassians and Vambre accidentally eats their king.

title: Flonk Stakes
description: At Ralphio's Sword Shop, the Warriors square off against an old school mate who is breaking all their beloved Magi-Swords.

title: Adventure Academy: The Thousand Eyed Stare
description: A staring contest with Blinky the Flower Boy seems simple enough, too simple, yet when Gateaux makes a spell to make the opponent more formidable, Vambre's Magiswords are needed.

title: Stairways & Spiders
description: The Warriors find themselves on a long and treacherous staircase guarded by a huge talking spider.

title: Collection Infection
description: Having pared down their Magisword collection, the Warriors are forced into unconventional battle choices on a dangerous mission into the Deepest Darkest Woods.

title: Adventure Academy: Trollblin Thumb Wrestling
description: Professor Cyrus' mechanical Trollblin thumb goes wonky when Bimm attempts the thumb-wresting exercise, so Prohyas uses Magiswords to pin down the rogue machine.

title: Hands Down
description: The Warriors finally get some business doing yard work for Old Man Oldman.

title: Adventure Academy: Enchanted Tree Chopping
description: Enchanted dust makes a cute little tree spring to life, but Vambre feels bad chopping it down until Witchy Simone casts a spell and it grows to proper Magisword attacking size!

title: Play That Song Again
description: Vambre gets on Prohyas for playing the same song too much, and he exacts revenge.

title: Adventure Academy: Meatier Milking
description: Prohyas and Cattus are chosen to milk a Meatier (a one-horned cow that serves frozen yogurt from its horn), but the pair agitate the beast and Magiswords are required to calm the bull into making desert.

title: No Robots for Old Men
description: Old Man Oldman is back with his secret weapon ‐ Grup taped to the Robopiggeh.

title: Adventure Academy: Barren Quicksand
description: When Prohyas and Familiar do exactly what they're NOT supposed to and sink fast in quicksand, Prohyas resorts to Magiswords to save himself and his fellow kitty student.

title: Can I Keep It?
description: Prohyas smuggles a Slime monster into Warriors' headquarters and things get hairy when the little guy starts to multiply.

title: Bark Attack
description: A Mysterious Hooded Woman hires Prohyas & Vambre to retrieve the Golden Spectacles from the Tree‐J in the Deepest Darkest Woods.

title: The Saddest Little Bunny
description: The Warriors encounter a stoic warrior bunny whom they misinterpret as "sad" and try to cheer him up.

title: Pig Iron
description: Vambre & Prohyas compete for the Oinkus Magisword against Super Mighty Robot Piggeh.

title: The Curse of Dummystein
description: Vambre gives Prohyas the silent treatment, only to have her voice stolen away by a ventriloquist dummy Frankenstein.

title: Adventure Academy: Adventure Academy 101
description: A student introduction gets interrupted by a Monster Attack Dummy come to life and the Warriors take it upon themselves to defeat it with Magiswords.

title: Do We Decimal System?
description: The Warriors seek a secret book in the Library of Shhh! and their best friend from warrior school "Witchy Simone" follows them.

title: Zombie Reasonable
description: On their quest to find the Zombie Pumpkin Magisword, the Warriors encounter Hoppus, and fight over who saw it first.

title: Flashback Farms
description: Trying to cheer Vambre up, Prohyas recalls when they were just kids on their parents broccoli Farm.

title: Adventure Academy: Oasis of Fear
description: In a lesson of survival, Phibby and Prohyas are instructed to create an "Oasis Of Fear" to frighten menacing desert night creatures, but Prohyas scares them away with Magiswords instead.

title: Adventure Academy: Delirious Dancing
description: Professor Cyrus shares that "sick dance moves" can disorient opponents in the Barren Faceland, but when faced with angry frilled running lizards in class Vambre finds that Magiswords help her dance moves.

title: What's My Name? Starring Vambre and Prohyas Warrior!
description: The Warriors go to extreme measures so folks remember their names.

title: Adventure Academy: Barking Broccoli Spider Barkdowns
description: To defeat Barking Broccoli Spiders one must beat them at their own game by barking back, but Neddy's fisticuffs approach makes Prohyas' Magisword remedy necessary.

title: Adventure Academy: Passe Pirates
description: The fashionable pirates of Keelhaul Cove won't mess with you if you garb them in embarrassing garments, but when the lesson goes awry, Vambre needs Magiswords to help save the class from a pirate shakedown.

title: For the Love of Narwhal
description: Vambre rejects Darlin' Narwhal Magisword as being unfit for battle, but when Prohyas trains and brings out its full potential, Vambre resorts to improper extremes to get it back.

title: To Balderly Go
description: Prohyas is crushed when his good hair day becomes a no hair day and Vambre has to battle a furry monster alone while her bro is in shock without his locks!

title: The Land Before Slime
description: Vambre & Prohyas head to the Dinosaur Kingdom to recover a lost baby dinosaur.

title: Vambre's Brain
description: Vambre can't get her brain to go to sleep and it takes control of her body.

title: Adventure Academy: Ham of Glory
description: Phibby Croax wants to fight in the extreme and has no patience to learn the ham-fisted fighting style in the day's lesson called, the Ham Of Glory, so Prohyas breaks out Magiswords to teach Phibby not to be a meathead.
